frontmatter.title: Debounce and Throttle
frontmatter.intro: Have you ever used a browser event such as `onscroll` or `onresize` in a web app? If you did, you certainly would have noticed how the app heavily slows down if you call anything that requires even a little bit of extra processing juice.
frontmatter.keywords: debounce, throttle, javascript, search, functional, lodash, underscore
